text: Penweathers is a hamlet in west Cornwall, England, United Kingdom. It is situated approximately one mile (1.6 km) west of Truro city centre.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 204 Truro & Falmouth ==See also== *Carrine Common & Penwethers ==References== The Truro to Falmouth branch railway line at Penweathers Category:Hamlets in Cornwall
title: Penweathers
